## EnvAdapter interface

Interface that summarizes the environment.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface EnvAdapter 
```

## Example

[DefaultEnvAdapter](./verse-three.defaultenvadapter.md)

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |

|  [getCamera()](./verse-three.envadapter.getcamera.md) | Camera for non-VR. |

|  [getHeadOffset()](./verse-three.envadapter.getheadoffset.md) | head offset object. |

|  [isVR()](./verse-three.envadapter.isvr.md) | Whether in VR mode or not. |

|  [onCursorLeave(el)](./verse-three.envadapter.oncursorleave.md) | Cursor leave event handler. like [mouseleave](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mouseleave_event)<!-- -->. |
|  [onGuiClick()](./verse-three.envadapter.onguiclick.md) | Called when any GUI element is clicked. |
